bibl.title: Nieznana budowla z centrum antycznego miasta w Marinie el-Alamein. [An unknown building from the centre of ancient town in Marina el-Alamein.]
bibl.note: The most interesting "unknown" building of the ancient town must have been situated in the very centre, in the area where its relics were found, east of the main square. Therefore it must have been a stately building, which is also indicated by considerable size of decoration elements. The appearance and size of the main façade can be reconstructed quite precisely, yet in three alternatives. - Avec résumés en polonais et en anglais.

bibl.title: Non solum villae. Księga jubileuszowa ofiarowana Profesorowi Stanisławowi Medekszy.

bibl.seg: Rafał Czerner, Nieznana budowla z centrum antycznego miasta w Marinie el-Alamein. [An unknown building from the centre of ancient town in Marina el-Alamein.]
Jacek Kościuk (ed.), Non solum villae. Księga jubileuszowa ofiarowana Profesorowi Stanisławowi Medekszy (Wrocław, 2010) pp. 115-128, 7 figg.

The most interesting "unknown" building of the ancient town must have been situated in the very centre, in the area where its relics were found, east of the main square. Therefore it must have been a stately building, which is also indicated by considerable size of decoration elements. The appearance and size of the main façade can be reconstructed quite precisely, yet in three alternatives. - Avec résumés en polonais et en anglais.
